summary:
Hello there weary traveller! please come an take a seat while I tell you the tale of Falsenvale...

This "city" if that's what you want to call it, contains many secrets and a swift and strict justice system, however traveller there have been whispers on the winds of a mighty wall, one that hides those thought lost to t
descriptionHtml:
[b]NO DLC REQUIRED[/b] 

This is a project I've been working on for 3+ months as part of a project I had to do for my school work. However this is not the finished product and I will be updating it as soon as I can, but remember I test everything new all by myself before one update is released but I can't spot everything, so please keep your eyes peeled for any problems in Arctain then let me know of them in the bugs and problems fourm so that I can either fix or work around the problem 

Why is it here if it's not done? 
I've put this on the workshop so that I can get feedback and information on any bugs and glitchs I didn't notice in my tests. If you happen to find a bug please put where you found it (or a nearby location) and a description of the problem (I can't fix it if I don't know the details) 

Where is it? 
To get to the city Look for a teleport marker called Arctain docks on your map northwest of Solitude. 

For those of you that like making maps for skyrim and the planet of Nirn and wish to add my island it's located near Aldmeris and Pyandonta 

Hello there! 
I just wanted to let you guys know that I'm going to have a series of videos put onto my Youtube channel that basically allows you guys to have input and see the development of The Phoenix Update as I work on it. The first of these video should be up sometime this weekend, if not it'll be up on Monday. Can't wait to work with you all :D 

[b]Special thanks:[/b] 
Reddit users: 
Tx12001 for writing The history of Falsenvale 
Kaocmasu for writing Eltheric's Pride
author: Killertube
